Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Indians in Spain are celebrating the construction of Ram Mandir in Ayodhya, based on a video of a dhol procession. There is no evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the dhol procession in Spain is specifically related to the construction of Ram Mandir. The video is from 2018 and was uploaded by a Mumbai-based group that performed at a folk music festival in Spain.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the dhol procession in Spain is in support of the construction of Ram Mandir, without providing any concrete evidence or statements from the participants.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation for the dhol procession in Spain could be that it was part of a cultural performance or festival unrelated to the construction of Ram Mandir.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is from 2018 and not related to the current construction of Ram Mandir in Ayodhya.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing accurate and up-to-date information about the video and its context.
Understate: There is no understatement bias in the provided claim.
